definition: occurring once a month, of or occurring or payable every month, a periodical that is published every month (or 12 issues per year)
details:
adverb
- occurring once a month
= example: occurring once a month
adjective
- of or occurring or payable every month
= example: of or occurring or payable every month
noun
- a periodical that is published every month (or 12 issues per year)
